item.title: Lady Gaga and More Name Their Favorite Pokemon During Super Bowl 60 Commercial
item.content:encoded:
The 30th anniversary of Pokemon took center stage for a brief moment during Super Bowl 60.

An entire generation of kids who wanted to be the ‚Äúvery best like no one ever was‚Äù has grown into a population of adults who have taken different paths but share a love of Pokemon and fond memories of it.

That love was on display in a Super Bowl 60 commercial. Trevor Noah, Lady Gaga, Blackpink‚Äôs Jisoo, and more all named their favorites and spoke about why they have a love for the franchise.

Lady Gaga‚Äôs Favorite Is Jigglypuff

It should come as no surprise that Lady Gaga is a fan of Jigglypuff. The Grammy Award-winning Superstar praised the fairy-type Pokemon for using her voice as a means of protection and self-defense. Gaga even noted that Jigglypuff has a 12-octave vocal range.

Trevor Noah remarked that his favorite is Psyduck. Noah praised Psyduck for its ability to change the world with its mind. He also said that every time you met a new one, it was like meeting a new part of yourself.

Charles Leclerc, Lamine Yamal, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, and Young Miko also appeared in the ad, which ran for just over a minute.

Pokemon Turns 30

2026 is a big year for Pokemon. It has been 30 years since Pokemon Red and Blue launched on the original Nintendo Game Boy. Pokemon Day falls on February 27 every year.

Each year, a stream hosted by The Pokemon Company sets the stage for the franchise‚Äôs immediate future. This year, fans expect the launch of the 10th generation of everyone‚Äôs favorite friendly monsters.

Which is your favorite Pokemon? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Microsoft Still Plans First-Party Xbox Handheld, It‚Äôs Claimed
item.content:encoded:
As Microsoft continues to shape its vision for the future of the Xbox brand, it still plans to develop a first-party handheld device, even if ‚Äúeverything is an Xbox.‚Äù

In 2025, ASUS launched the ROG Xbox Ally series of handheld gaming devices. The two new devices were more powerful versions of the previously launched ROG Ally systems, designed to make it easier to access PC game launchers, including Xbox Game Pass.

Still, a new report from Jez Corden notes that plans remain in place for a first-party Xbox handheld, even if the next mainline Xbox console is the primary focus for now.

The next-generation Xbox platform is touted as Microsoft‚Äôs boldest effort in the gaming space to date, even after a game-changing quarter-century. As such, they‚Äôre not committing to a firm launch date for the next home console yet.

Major Changes Coming Soon to the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally

The report from Corden notes that Microsoft is testing a new NPU-driven highlights feature for the Xbox Ally X that automatically transforms gameplay clips into shareable videos. This feature is slated for a March 2026 release.

The next Xbox console is also set to take notes from the Ally X handheld by bringing multiple launchers, such as the Epic Games launcher and Steam, to the platform. Regardless of the hardware, the overall message remains the same: make Xbox accessible anywhere and everywhere.

item.title: Man Murders His Girlfriend But is More Concerned About ‚ÄòMissing‚Äô GTA 6
item.content:encoded:
Robert Richens was apprehended by UK police last year for brutally murdering his former girlfriend. Recently, Richens appeared at Oxford Crown Court for sentencing, being sent down with a life sentence on February 6, 2026. In new footage captured by the police officers who brought Richens in, it was revealed that the killer had something else on his mind at the time.

In a clip that has gone viral in recent days, Richens was caught sobbing midway through being arrested, blurting out that he was going to ‚Äòmiss GTA‚Äô.

‚ÄòCallous‚Äô and ‚ÄòMerciless‚Äô Murder

In a report published by Thames Valley Police in the United Kingdom, itwas confirmed that Robert Richens, aged 35, was jailed for life, with a minimum term of 16 years, for the 2025 murder of his former partner.

Per the report, Richens had called emergency services on the morning of May 30 and stressed that he‚Äôd accidentally killed someone. Upon investigation, it was found that his former partner, Rachael Vaughan, had been subject to a ‚Äòsustained assault‚Äô that had left her lifeless.

Here‚Äôs the clip that surfaced recently on social media, showing Richens sobbing and lamenting the loss of Grand Theft Auto 6:

In the video, a police officer casually asks what GTA he‚Äôs referring to, and when Richens simply said, ‚ÄòSix,‚Äô the officer brushed it off, suggesting he ‚Äòhad ages‚Äô until the game came out.

Richens won‚Äôt only miss Grand Theft Auto 6, but likely Grand Theft Auto 7 too, if Rockstar‚Äôs release cadence is anything to go by. While UK prisons permit games consoles, they‚Äôre only allowed older units that cannot connect to the internet, which includes the likes of the PlayStation 2 and original Xbox.

During sentencing, the judge labelled Richens‚Äô actions as callous and merciless for the crime he‚Äôd pleaded guilty to.

item.title: PS6 and PlayStation Handheld To Have Impressive Memory Specs, It‚Äôs Claimed
item.content:encoded:
The latest round of PlayStation 6 claims surfaced recently, alongside claims regarding the upcoming ‚ÄòPlayStation handheld‚Äô, dubbed Project Canis. In a series of posts on NeoGAF, reliable tech leaker, KeplerL2, divulged some tidbits about the upcoming next generation of PlayStation hardware, focused squarely on memory capabilities.

In the string of posts, KeplerL2 claimed that the PlayStation 6 could boast up to 30 GB of GDDR7 memory, using a specific configuration to fit it into the console. Elsewhere, the PlayStation handheld, KeplerL2 says, could have as much as 24 GB of LPDDR5X memory, putting it at least on par with the recently released ROG Xbox Ally X, arguably the most premium handheld on the market.

PlayStation 6 and PlayStation Handheld Claims Surface Again

It‚Äôs once every few months that we‚Äôre seeing fresh information emerge regarding the next generation of PlayStation hardware.

In April 2025, we had claims come from KeplerL2 that the upcoming PlayStation handheld won‚Äôt be as powerful as the PlayStation 5. In August, a fresh wave of technical specs leaked for both devices, and in October, it was claimed that the PlayStation 6 will be released as early as 2027.

This new spate of information comes from KeplerL2 again, who has proven to be mostly reliable in the past for technical insights.

In a thread on NeoGAF, KeplerL2 addressed a question around how Sony would ‚Äòhit 30GB of GDDR7 with only 4GB modules on a 160-bit bus.‚Äô

Per KeplerL2, the tech titan would opt for 3 GB memory modules arranged in a clamshell configuration. It would reduce the memory bus but hit a higher memory speed overall and promote more bandwidth, as much as 640 GB/s (thanks to videocardz.com for the breakdown).

Additionally, KeplerL2 suggested that a ‚Äògood amount of memory‚Äô for the PlayStation portable (‚ÄòPS6 handheld‚Äô) would be 24 GB, which is more or less the industry standard right now for top-tier handheld gaming devices.

As always, these kinds of claims or suggestions should be taken with a grain of salt until we have it from the horse‚Äôs mouth.

item.title: WWE 2K26 Dev Confident Fans Will Like New Ringside Pass
item.content:encoded:
WWE 2K26 is introducing a new Ringside Pass, similar to battle pass systems in other games. Now, the gameplay designer, Cornell Gunter, explains the benefits fans can expect from this new addition.

WWE 2K26 is set to release worldwide on March 13. This year‚Äôs game features the return of several match types to WWE video games. However, there are also many changes coming to this year‚Äôs game, including the introduction of a new Ringside Pass, which changes how unlockables work in the series.

WWE 2K26 Dev Says Ringside Pass Is About Content First and Foremost

During a recent interview with JustBryan, WWE 2K26 gameplay designer Cornell Gunter praised the changes that the new Ringside Pass will offer. He notes that Ringside Pass Premium will offer day-one DLC. He also notes that the new system is strictly about content rather than time-sensitive releases.

While it is divided into seasons, none of the benefits are time-limited. If a player returns to the game after several months away, they will still have access to all premium content. Overall, there will be 120 reward items per season.

‚ÄúI‚Äôm very excited to see what the reactions are by the end of the lifecycle. Because I think people are going to be very, very happy with what we are able to achieve and what we brought to the table with the Ringside Pass,‚Äù Gunter said.

WWE 2K26 Adds A New Layer of Realism to the Squared Circle

In addition to features such as the new Ringside Pass, WWE 2K26 is enhancing the realism players can bring to simulated AI-only bouts.

A new AI customization tool enables players to program move sequences for specific WWE Superstars. Once set, AI will regularly attempt to execute the spots in succession. Learn more about this new feature at this link.

item.title: Team Vitality Wins IEM Krakow After 3-1 Victory over FURIA
item.content:encoded:
Team Vitality has lifted the trophy at IEM Krakow, extending a phenomenal record over the last year or so and sending FURIA packing at the final post. The victory came after a hard-fought battle in the Tauron Arena in front of thousands of fans, but Vitality‚Äôs final streak through FURIA was a masterclass to behold.

Only the opening round on Mirage was of any use to the Brazilian side, stumping up a tough 11-13 finish that quickly went squandered in the subsequent maps. By the third map, Team Vitality was dominating 13-2, showing why it was worthy of that all-important trophy and the $400,000 prize.

Team Vitality Matches IEM Krakow Predictions

In our earlier coverage, our IEM Krakow predictions had Team Vitality sitting pretty in first place, and it‚Äôs always nice to be validated by the result.

Team Vitality has pushed onwards and upwards with a monumental, award-winning streak that has left the team being regarded as one of the all-time greatest Counter-Strike rosters ever created. In the last year, the organization has edged into double-digit territory in terms of trophies raised, and this latest one, secured at the first IEM Krakow event, is more ammunition for the cabinet.

Before IEM Krakow, the team‚Äôs last win came at the StarLadder Budapest Major in December, which yielded a 3-1 win over FaZe Clan and a $500,000 prize.

Krakow seemed in the bag for Vitality throughout much of the tournament. For die-hard fans of the brand, this was only ever going to go one way.

item.title: Microsoft Not Committed to Hard 2027 Launch for Next Xbox, It‚Äôs Claimed
item.content:encoded:
Microsoft expects its current-generation Xbox Series consoles to have a longer-than-usual lifespan.

The gaming industry is beginning to consider what the next generation of hardware will look like. The Nintendo Switch 2 was released in 2025, and both PlayStation and Xbox are focused on their next iterations. Microsoft is focused on a future where almost any device can be considered an Xbox. In 2025, this led to the launch of the ROG Ally Xbox handhelds and to additional releases from Microsoft-owned developers on Sony and Nintendo platforms.

Regarding a next-generation home offering from Xbox, AMD CEO Lisa Su recently stated that development of the next-gen Xbox, which will feature an AMD semi-custom SoC, is progressing well and could support a potential 2027 launch. However, that doesn‚Äôt mean 2027 is a lock for players looking to bring the next Xbox console to their living room.

A 2027 Launch Window Is Not Solidified

A new report from Jez Corden notes that Microsoft hasn‚Äôt committed to a firm 2027 launch window for its next major platform and expects the current Xbox generation and the PS5 to have a longer lifespan. This is a result of a ‚Äúbroadening hardware endpoint ecosystem.‚Äù It‚Äôs also noted that Xbox isn‚Äôt sure of the price of its next console due to current global economic conditions and rising memory and storage costs.

Still, even if the next-gen Xbox comes in at a premium price of $1,000, Microsoft stated that, like other developers, it is ensuring its games run on Nintendo Switch 2 and other devices, so all players can still experience Xbox games. Additionally, it‚Äôs reported that Microsoft is collaborating with OEMs such as ASUS to develop a range of next-gen Xbox options for gamers at various price points. This is not unusual, as Microsoft has been releasing consoles with multiple SKUs for generations.

Microsoft Wants a Polished Windows Experience on the Next Xbox

Furthermore, it was reported that Microsoft insiders were caught off guard by Lisa Su‚Äôs comments about a 2027 launch for the next console. There is no internal commitment to a launch date at Xbox, as much of the Next Generation experience depends on improvements to Windows 11.

Microsoft‚Äôs Windows and Xbox teams are working more closely than ever to deliver the best Windows OS experience on Xbox. Right now, 2027 is viewed internally as a ‚Äúbest-case scenario,‚Äù but Microsoft is not committing to a specific date to ensure a proper experience for players.

Microsoft is also considering changes to its Game Pass subscription service. These changes are long-term and may not be implemented for quite some time. Learn more about them here.
